commit.message: Merge branch 'fis_fallback' of github.com:firebase/firebase-android-sdk into fis_fallback

nodes.bodyText:
I recommend avoiding to mention Sender-ID in public documentation, because it is only an internal fall-back mechanism for us.
Feel free to describe in (Java) code-comments.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -107,12 +107,21 @@
   }
 
   /**
-   * Perform pre-condition checks to make sure {@link FirebaseOptions#getApiKey()} and {@link
-   * FirebaseOptions#getProjectId()} are not null.
+   * Perform pre-condition checks to make sure {@link FirebaseOptions#getApiKey()} and ({@link
+   * FirebaseOptions#getProjectId()} or {@link FirebaseOptions#getGcmSenderId()} ()} are not null.

nodes.bodyText:
How about checkNotEmpty?
Reason: If the value is set to "" it doesn't help us either.

Wanna create a method for firebaseApp.getOptions().getApiKey()?
maybe #getApiKey?
I hope I did not make you add another factor that could make our SDK fail, haha
